description:
Snow-loving socks to impress everyone with your style choices when you slip your boots off. Full cushioning throughout to keep feet comfortable for long days on your board. Design inspired by snowboarder Bryan Iguchi.

  • 4-Degree Elite Fit System combines two elastics for stretch and recovery to keep the socks in place
  • Indestructawool blend improves durability in high-wear areas
  • Mesh vent zones provide temperature and moisture management
  • Virtually Seamless™ toe for chafe-free wear
name: Smartwool Snowboard Full Cushion Iguchi Pattern OTC Socks - Unisex
